alert.note: Alert for Lee; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 4:34PM EDT until August 08 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 434 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cuthbert, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dawson, Leesburg, Albany, Smithville, Sasser, Bronwood, Parrott, Chokee, Stocks, Forrester, Palmyra, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Chambliss, Olivers Mill, Neyami, Chickasawhatchee, Bridges Crossroad, Century and Herod. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
